quiz.text: What is Microcredit?
options: it is the small credit given to poor
it is the amount given by Govt. for Small Industries Development
it is the amount given to the students as education loan
is the installment given by Farmers against Loan
None of the above

It is a company defined by companies act, 2013
It is a corporation or company incorporated by the law in force in India
It is included in the Second Schedule of Reserve Bank of India Act, 1934.
All of the above

quiz.text: What do you mean by 'Tax Haven’?

It is a country where people need not to pay

Luxury tax

It is a country where foreigners need not to pay

any tax on their income.

It is a country where people need not to pay

Municipal tax
It is a country that offers foreign individuals and businesses little or no tax liability in a politically and economically static environment
None of these
